blaze

creative builder

experience

2022 – present
At PartyDAO, I contributed to the design of UNO, the most-used wallet on World, and ORO. I also helped design Party, a group chat with a shared wallet that can do anything onchain.
2021 – 2022
Founding designer at Showtime. Also collaborated with WorkOS on marketing graphics.
2015 – 2017
At Bitovi, delivered major web projects for Lowe's and Levi's.
2013 – 2017
Freelance designer focused on experimental 3D projects, including space and weather-related visualizations.
2010 – 2012
At Scribd, focused on designing and enhancing their core website.

projects

2025
Wind Vector (Demo), a 3D visualization tool for exploring wind patterns at different flight levels.
2025
How's the Roads? is an iOS app to check live highway conditions and weather in Kansas City on a simple map with tappable camera icons. You can also save your favorites for quick access.
2024
Holy Hues is a pocket Bible iOS app that lets you style verses with custom fonts and colors, then save and share them as wallpapers or share them on social media.
2021
Marbles is a digital art collection that uses vivid gradients of pink, blue, violet, and gold to create depth, while reflective cores glow like cosmic jewels. Blending traditional glass craftsmanship with sci-fi flair, it transforms simple forms into collectible digital sculptures.
